reviewText: Beware of the region. Info not posted with item. You have to click through several screens to find out it won't play in the US. Very disappointed. Can't even resell.
Very nice. Quite to my expectations.

The show in itself is amazing, hilarious, insightful, and challenges your own ethics.

The package came well protected, though some of the season sets were damaged.

I can't complain though because it was such a great price! Shipping was quick and seller was great!

I've been watching so much House that I'm able to memorize the patients diagnosis !!

MUST WATCH, MUST BUY
Got the DVDs well ahead of the time specified.  Arrived in good order and look forward to watching them in the future
